content:
You pause for a moment to see how Raemon is doing. He lags behind slightly, exhaustion catching up with him. "Where are we headed, anyway?" he asks, curious.

RANGERS CHOOSE

A) Continue helping Raemon.

Discard all   from Raemon.

B) Part ways.

Discard Raemon and return HELPING HAND to the collection. Each Ranger soothes 2 fatigue.
